data.title: Great ride!
data.text:
Called and made reservation with Blake.  Told him the type of ride we were looking to do.  On the day of our ride he met us with bikes ready to go and a detailed map to use.  Map had a couple of routes laid out and then Blake went over them and made sure we were good to go.
Great ride through an older neighborhood and onto a forest trail. Back into newer homes and the turn around point for the loop.  All on a bike trail and mostly out of traffic.

data.title: Haunted Bike Ride
data.text: We got a groupon for our family of four to take the haunted bike tour.  It was fun and informative, and we would strongly suggest you check it out.

data.title: Fun Way to Spend Afternoon
data.text: My family was visiting AZ for spring break.  Decided to buy a groupon for AZ Pedal Tours and am thrilled that we did.  For 90 minutes we were treated to a history lesson about Flagstaff and a lot of fun.  It was a great way to see the town, learn some interesting Flagstaff facts and meet people from the area who clued us in on where to eat, what to visit and just made our trip out west a lot more special

data.title: Great way to view Flagstaff!
data.text: Although the shop was closed when we tried to visit, Gina was able to accommodate us almost immediately with a private bike tour!t boyfriend and I did the City Tour before our visit to the Grand Canyon and it was the perfect way to learn about the city and get recommendations for food and drinks! Gina was very knowledgable and friendly. Would highly recommend this tour if visiting Flagstaff!!
